title: Hip Hop Foundations
description: This class introduces hip hop dance, including isolations, popping, locking, and basic footwork.

title: Hip Hop Freestyle
description: This class helps you develop your own unique movement vocabulary and respond to music in the moment.

title: Jazz Funk
description: This class is perfect for those who love to dance with power and attitude.

title: Contact Improvisation
description: This class focuses on movement through touch and weight sharing.

title: Jazz Technique
description: This class focuses on classic jazz styles while building strength, flexibility, and musicality.
